1.0.2.name: connect20/Facebook_Like_Box_In_Sidebar
1.0.2.description:
This extension is now available as a
Facebook Like Box In Sidebar  on your store for customers to easily like &  share you on facebook.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

1.0.1.name: connect20/Facebook_Like_Box_In_Sidebar
1.0.1.description: Shows LikeBox of your FaceBook Page on your store for customers to easily follow you on FaceBook.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
